page.title: 04THE OBAN TIMES
page.content: The local newspaper for this area is known as The Oban Times, in it is contained both local and national news items which will be of interest to the local population. Unfortunatly that which tends to be of most interest is often bad news. This is particularly true if the incident invloves local people. For instance there have been over the years some plane crashes in the hills around Dalmally. When such a disaster occurs people of the village are directly involved firstly in the search for the survivors and secondly in caring for them until suitable professional help can be summoned. Such times although regretable bring the people of the village together and prove how well they combine as a team. Often as well as such major crisis search parties must organised to search for lost hillwalkers.
